about_the_game:
In this Visual Novel, you will step into the shoes of a gifted young man as he begins his journey at Westview Academy, an elite institution renowned for its world-class sports facilities and prestigious music program. Here, every decision shapes your future—will you rise to glory as a star athlete, or will you captivate the world with your musical talent?

Surrounded by a diverse cast of friends, rivals, and romantic interests, your time at Westview Academy will be filled with life-changing choices, deep relationships, and unforgettable experiences. Navigate through moments of comedy, drama, and passion, forging your own path in a world where every action has consequences.

Choice-Driven Storytelling – Shape your story with meaningful choices that lead to unique outcomes.
Multiple Love Interests – Explore deep and wholesome relationships with a variety of compelling characters, each with their own personalities and story arcs.
Engaging Mix of Comedy, Drama, and Romance – A dynamic narrative that balances lighthearted fun with intense, emotional moments.
Fully Animated Lewd Scenes – High-quality, immersive adult content featuring fluid animations and replay galleries.
Two Distinct Career Paths – Pursue greatness as a sports legend or a rockstar musician, with each route offering different experiences, challenges, and romantic opportunities.
Cinematic Presentation – Enjoy smooth animated transitions and lovely visual storytelling.

Your story at Westview Academy is yours to write. Will you chase fame, love, or something even greater?

Your journey begins now.
